original_text: She says to people who do not understand what is right, ‘Anyone who is foolish should come in here. She says to people who do not understand what is right, ‘Anyone who is foolish should come in here. She says to people who do not understand what is right, ‘Anyone who is foolish should come in here.
korean_text: 어리석은 자는 이리로 돌이키라 또 지혜 없는 자에게 이르기를

sentences.original_text: She says to people who do not understand what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 무엇이 옳은지 이해하지 못하는 사람들에게 말합니다

sentences.original_text: who do not understand what is right
Anyone who is foolish should come in here
